attributes.action: Hold an inquiry into the environmental impact of the switch from analogue to digital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Digital radios use 10 times more power than analogue.
Digital TV's use 30 times more power.
Multiply that by around 25 million households with TV and radio.
The effects of the switch from analogue to digital will probably wipe out any environmental gains by 2012.
